title: Crosshair X
description: Get a competitive edge by customizing your crosshair to be clear and precise on every game you play. You can start out with a featured pro Crosshair or a community design, then make adjustments to create a custom gaming solution that takes your aim to the next level. The Casting of Frank Stone

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850

game_info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Photo Editing, Utilities, Game Development
